name: Amazing Ollie
overview: In Amazing Ollie, Ollie the Octopus must be moved around different undersea mazes, in order to catch fish for himself, and his hungry children. Amazing Ollie is an entertaining program that enables young children to improve their numerical skills and hand-eye coordination. there are options for basic recognition and counting of numbers, addition, going against-the-clock, and even an advanced option. Each new maze is literally one in a million, and they are generated randomly at the beginning of each game. Game types: 1. Finding Fish 2. Counting Fish 3. Beat the Clock 4. Advanced Option 5. Demonstration Loop
